execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the EU sales system with their IDs, full names and emails (exclude null names). The application will compute name similarity later.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS eu_id, full_name AS eu_full_name, email AS eu_email, country AS eu_country FROM customers WHERE full_name IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the US sales system with their IDs, full names and emails (exclude null names). The application will compute name similarity later and compare to EU results.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS us_id, full_name AS us_full_name, email AS us_email, country AS us_country FROM customers WHERE full_name IS NOT NULL;
